torchnlp.datasets package¶

Submodules¶

torchnlp.datasets.count module¶

torchnlp.datasets.count.count_dataset(train=False, dev=False, test=False, train_rows=10000, dev_rows=1000, test_rows=1000, seq_max_length=10)[source]¶

Used for sequence to label tests.

Sample Data:
text: 1 2 3 count: 3

torchnlp.datasets.dataset module¶

class torchnlp.datasets.dataset.Dataset(rows)[source]¶

Bases: torch.utils.data.dataset.Dataset

torchnlp.datasets.reverse module¶

torchnlp.datasets.reverse.reverse_dataset(train=False, dev=False, test=False, train_rows=10000, dev_rows=1000, test_rows=1000, seq_max_length=10)[source]¶

Used for sequence to sequence tests.

Sample Data:
Input: 1 2 3 Output: 3 2 1

torchnlp.datasets.simple_qa module¶

torchnlp.datasets.simple_qa.simple_qa_dataset(directory='data/simple_qa', train=False, dev=False, test=False, train_filename='annotated_fb_data_train.txt', dev_filename='annotated_fb_data_valid.txt', test_filename='annotated_fb_data_test.txt')[source]¶

Dataset introduced by this paper: https://research.fb.com/publications/large-scale-simple-question-answering-with-memory-networks/

Example

First row from the development annotated_fb_data_valid dataset:

subject: Who was the trump ocean club international hotel and tower named after
relation: www.freebase.com/symbols/namesake/named_after
object: www.freebase.com/m/0cqt90
question: www.freebase.com/m/0f3xg_

torchnlp.datasets.zero_to_zero module¶

torchnlp.datasets.zero_to_zero.zero_to_zero_dataset(train=False, dev=False, test=False, train_rows=256, dev_rows=64, test_rows=64)[source]¶

Used for quick integration testing.

Sample Data:
Input: 0 Output: 0

torchnlp.datasets.simple_qa_dataset(directory='data/simple_qa', train=False, dev=False, test=False, train_filename='annotated_fb_data_train.txt', dev_filename='annotated_fb_data_valid.txt', test_filename='annotated_fb_data_test.txt')[source]¶

Dataset introduced by this paper: https://research.fb.com/publications/large-scale-simple-question-answering-with-memory-networks/

Example

subject: Who was the trump ocean club international hotel and tower named after
relation: www.freebase.com/symbols/namesake/named_after
object: www.freebase.com/m/0cqt90
question: www.freebase.com/m/0f3xg_
